oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Buddy Starcher Sunway Vitamins program - VIII (3)
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Buddy Starcher radio transcription sponsored by Sunway Vitamins, circa late 1940s. Labeled as program number IV but containing content identical to other discs labeled as program number VIII (see TR001387_2, TR001388_2). All grooves scratched through.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Buddy Starcher
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: Theme -- Opening statement (Buddy Starcher) -- The Last Mile -- Sunway Vitamins commercial (Buddy Starcher) -- If Today Were The End Of The World -- Sunway Vitamins commercial (Buddy Starcher) -- Rag Doll -- Closing statement (Buddy Starcher) -- Theme
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: Starcher, Buddy, 1906-2001
